Question & Options:
Which location is notable for being featured in the trailer of a Bollywood movie, marking it as the first film to be shot there?
Options:
A. the trailer
B. the film
C. un headquarters
D. the director

What was the unique aspect of the film that involved around 200 students from different colleges?
Options:
A. It was shot at the UN headquarters.
B. It featured a famous Bollywood star.
C. It was based on a true story.
D. It included a musical score by a renowned composer.
Correct Answer: It was shot at the UN headquarters.
